actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A joint resolution relating to foreign control of United States financial institutions.

summary.text: Directs the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System, in consultation with other Federal agencies, to report to Congress concerning: (1) the impact of foreign takeovers of U.S. financial institutions; and (2) statutory changes to prevent or limit such takeovers. Prohibits the approval of applications relating to the foreign takeover of any U.S. financial institution, with specified exceptions.

titles.title: A joint resolution relating to foreign control of United States financial institutions.
